summary: Continue Watching feature testing completed. All 7 requested features are working correctly: section renders with localStorage data, progress bars visible, logo shows on hover, trailer loads after 6s, play button navigates with ?t= resume parameter, and WatchPage passes startAt to VixSrc for both movies and TV shows with season/episode.

minor.issue: CORS error - localhost:8001 blocked by browser. App gracefully falls back to defaults.

issues: Second card (Breaking Bad) shows 'OFFICIAL TRAILER' text watermark - this is from TMDB backdrop image, not a bug

critical_code_review_comments: Mixed Content warnings in console - TMDB URLs using http:// instead of https://. Should update image URLs to use https://image.tmdb.org instead of http://image.tmdb.org
CORS issue with localhost:8001 in VITE_BACKEND_URL - not critical as app has fallback
seed_data_creation: Test data injected via localStorage: netflix_continue_watching key with movie (tmdbId: 299536) and TV show (tmdbId: 1396) items
context_for_next_testing_agent: Continue Watching feature fully tested. To reproduce tests: inject localStorage data using localStorage.setItem('netflix_continue_watching', JSON.stringify([{tmdbId: 299536, mediaType: 'movie', ...}])). All features verified: ContinueWatchingSection renders, progress bars visible, VideoCardPortal shows logo on hover, trailer loads after 6s, play button navigates to WatchPage with ?t= resume param, VixSrc iframe receives startAt parameter for both movies and TV shows.

test_results.feature_1_continue_watching_section_rend: PASSED - Section renders when localStorage has continue watching data
test_results.feature_2_progress_bars_visible: PASSED - Red progress bars (#e50914) visible at bottom of cards
test_results.feature_3_logo_on_hover: PASSED - VideoCardPortal shows TMDB logo image (w300 size) instead of title text
test_results.feature_4_trailer_after_6_seconds: PASSED - YouTube trailer iframe loads after 6 second hover delay
